abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column shares interviews with New York City Police Dept officers, all on condition of anonymity, in connection with federal investigation into corruption in New York City Police Dept; reports have emerged of extremely valuable gifts being lavished on high-ranking police officials now under investigation.

headline.print_headline: In Minefield of Gifts, Some Police Leaders Tread More Lightly Than Others
headline.main: In Minefield of Gifts, Some Police Leaders Tread More Lightly Than Others

snippet: Current and former New York Police Department precinct commanders describe cases in which they struggled to discern between acceptable and unacceptable gifts.
lead_paragraph: Current and former New York Police Department precinct commanders describe cases in which they struggled to discern between acceptable and unacceptable gifts.
